text: Moondance is a 1995 Irish German British drama movie directed by Dagmar Hirtz and was based on the 1936 novel The White Hare by Francis Stuart. It stars Rúaidhrí Conroy, Ian Shaw, Marianne Faithfull, Julia Brendler, Brendan Grace, Gerard McSorley and Joan O'Hara. ==Other websites== * * Moondance at AllMovie Category:1995 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Dublin
title: Moondance (movie)
